verses.verse: And it came to pass, when all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, which were on the <S%H5676>side<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>, and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, which were by the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had dried <S%H3001>up<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, until we were passed <S%H5674>over<s%>, that their <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H4549>melted<s%>, neither was there <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in them any more, <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H6213>Make<s%> thee <S%H6697>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>knives<s%>, and <S%H4135>circumcise<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the second <S%H8145>time<s%>. sharp: or, knives of flints

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> him <S%H6697>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>knives<s%>, and <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of the <S%H6190>foreskins<s%>. sharp: or, knives of flints the hill: or, Gibeah-haaraloth

And this is the <S%H1697>cause<s%> why <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> did <S%H4135>circumcise<s%>: All the <S%H5971>people<s%> that came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, that were <S%H2145>males<s%>, even all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, after they came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

<S%H3588>Now<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that came <S%H3318>out<s%> were <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>: but all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H3209>born<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> as they came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, them they had not <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>.

For the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, till all the <S%H1471>people<s%> that were <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, which came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, were <S%H8552>consumed<s%>, because they <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: unto whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> that he would not <S%H7200>shew<s%> them the <S%H776>land<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%> that he would <S%H5414>give<s%> us, a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>.

And their <S%H1121>children<s%>, whom he raised <S%H6965>up<s%> in their stead, them <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>: for they were <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%>, because they had not <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> them by the <S%H1870>way<s%>.

And it came to pass, when they had <S%H8552>done<s%> <S%H4135>circumcising<s%> all the <S%H1471>people<s%>, that they <S%H3427>abode<s%> in their places in the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, till they were <S%H2421>whole<s%>. they had: Heb. the people had made an end to be circumcised

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, This <S%H3117>day<s%> have I rolled <S%H1556>away<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> from off you. Wherefore the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>. Gilgal: that is Rolling

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, and <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>.

And they did <S%H398>eat<s%> of the old <S%H5669>corn<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> after the <S%H6453>passover<s%>, unleavened <S%H4682>cakes<s%>, and <S%H7033>parched<s%> corn in the <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And the <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H7673>ceased<s%> on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> after they had <S%H398>eaten<s%> of the old <S%H5669>corn<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>; neither had the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4478>manna<s%> any more; but they did <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H8393>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> that <S%H8141>year<s%>.

And it came to pass, when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> was by <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, that he lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked<s%>, and, behold, there <S%H5975>stood<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> over against him with his <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H8025>drawn<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> unto him, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Art thou for us, or for our <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Nay; but as <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> am I now <S%H935>come<s%>. And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and did <S%H7812>worship<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, What <S%H1696>saith<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> unto his <S%H5650>servant<s%>? captain: or, prince

And the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%> <S%H6635>host<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H5394>Loose<s%> thy <S%H5275>shoe<s%> from off thy <S%H7272>foot<s%>; for the <S%H4725>place<s%> whereon thou <S%H5975>standest<s%> is <S%H6944>holy<s%>. And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so.
